latest_articles.title: D.C. protesters say they were attacked by guards of Azerbaijani president
latest_articles.summary: Azerbaijan’s Ilham Aliyev is in town for a meeting of Trump’s Board of Peace. Police said an incident that “involved Azerbaijan security guards” had been referred to the State Department.

latest_articles.title: Vance visits Armenia, Azerbaijan as Trump eyes deals in Russia’s sphere
latest_articles.summary: The vice president’s historic trip illustrates Trump’s transactional diplomacy and willingness to use economic muscle to elbow out rivals such as Russia and Iran.
